Form Radio

input:radio


<!-- label 미사용 -->
<span class="form-radio">
  <input type="radio" class="radio" title="레이블 대신 title 속성 사용">
  <i class="icon"></i>
</span>
<!-- label 사용 -->
<label class="form-radio">
  <input type="radio" class="radio">
  <span class="name">레이블</span>
</label>

input:radio large


<!-- label 미사용 -->
<span class="form-radio form-radio--large">
  <input type="radio" class="radio" title="레이블 대신 title 속성 사용">
  <i class="icon"></i>
</span>
<!-- label 사용 -->
<label class="form-radio form-radio--large">
  <input type="radio" class="radio">
  <span class="name">레이블</span>
</label>

input:radio 성별


<div class="form-radio-button-group">
  <label class="form-radio">
    <input type="radio" class="radio" name="gender">
    <span class="name">남</span>
  </label>
  <label class="form-radio">
    <input type="radio" class="radio" name="gender">
    <span class="name">여</span>
  </label>
</div>
